ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@pinkpig.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 10:36 AM To: eqbards@egroups.com Subject: [eqbards] Survey - System
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 10:36 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance


To keep this whole concept on topic, I'd like to start a survey of system
specs vs. apparent performance.
Just fill in the blanks and let's share what works and what doesn't!

Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: Duron 600
RAM: 128M PC100
Video Card (and RAM): Soon to be Voodoo5 5500 (64M although with 2 video
processors in SLI mode it equates to 32M)
Video Resolution: 640x480
Sound Card: Diamond Monster MX300 (dang Aureal for going belly up!)
HD speed (rpm): not 7200RPM sure wish it was
'Net speed: Cable modem (I've been getting way high ping times recently --
saw something on the Verant boards about checking packet fragmentation which
I'll try out soon. I'll let everyone know how it goes.)
Geographic Location: Oklahoma
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Double Layer
Particle Effects: Max
Mip Mapping: will be on with Glide mode
Clip plane distance: Max (with the GTS in ALL zones I have played in with
NO video lag -- assume the same with Voodoo5)

How many songs can you twist? 3 (never tried 4)
Do you slow down when it rains? no
How about in Unrest or Kunark? no video lag with GTS (assume none with
Voodoo5)
